segments.text: What's the matter with you then ? You look miserable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you always say you're busy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you often go back to live with your parents and leave our son in the room by himself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ... I ... I miss my parents , also they miss me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh I remember , I cut terrible calls , and you didn't say anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean I am groaned a few words ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Totally not . Perhaps it's about our marriage .
segments.speaker: S2
